SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class Cli

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Client.ClientManager
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientListener, ClientUpdateListener, Runnable
public class Cli extends ClientManager
this class represents a command-line interface (CLI) for the game client.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Cli(Scanner scanner)
    Constructs a CLI object with the specified scanner for user input.

      Allows the user to make a turn choice. Prompts the user to choose an action and continues until an exit condition is met.

      public void removeChoice()
      Allows the user to make a remove choice. Prompts the user to choose an action and continues until an exit condition is met.

    • display

      public int display(boolean type)
      Displays the menu options and handles the user's choice. Returns 0 if the user wants to continue, 1 if the user wants to exit.
      Parameters:
      type - boolean
      Returns:
      true to continue, false to exit.
